extension.description:
Handles customer item delivery date selection.
This allows different delivery dates for each item.
See separate Order Delivery Date plugin if you want one delivery date per order.

Requires:

(a) Add Hikashop custom item field called: item_delivery_date
Parameters: text, required, publish, display both front-end and back-end form.

This field contains raw the value of the HTML OPTION for the user's selected delivery date.
This raw value can be used, if required, to determine shipping plugin availability and pricing.

Can be made optional by setting to non-required. See Customer Messages on right hand side.
If optional the no delivery date prompt will be ignored (i.e. blank option label will be shown).

(b) Add Hikashop custom item field called: item_delivery_date_text
Parameters: text, required, publish, display both front-end and back-end form.

This field contains the label of the HTML OPTION for the user's selected delivery date.
This field is displayed in order listings, invoices and emails.

(c) Modify Hikashop display views;
Refer to example files in the html folder attached to this plugin.
See code between BRAINFORGE comments for examples of how the new fields are handled.
Make sure you only change the template overrides, not the core Hikashop files!
See the html/emails folder for advice on customising emails.

The raw value field contains the following information: Ymd@x@y@x
Where:
  Ymd = the delivery date (PHP date format)
  x = the number of calendar days since order creation.
  y = the number of delivery days (including extras) since order creation.
  z = the number of standard delivery days since order creation.

There is a separate bfmanual Hikashop shipping plugin which can be used to cater for different carriers / prices depending on the delivery date.

field.name: lastestordertime
field.label: Last order time
field.description:
Enter the latest order time for next (or earliest) day delivery.
Use 24hr format - H:i
E.G. 06:08 17:05

field.name: maxdaysinadvance
field.label: Days in advance to show
field.description: Enter maximum days in advance delivery can be arranged.

field.name: minadvancedays
field.label: Minimum days before delivery
field.description: Enter the minimum number of days between ordering and delivery (enter 0 for next day deliveries).

field.name: defaultdaysdelay
field.label: Default delivery delay
field.description: Enter the number of days delay between the order day and the default delivery day (0 = next day always shown).

field.name: monday
field.label: Monday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: tuesday
field.label: Tuesday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: wednesday
field.label: Wednesday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: thursday
field.label: Thursday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: friday
field.label: Friday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: saturday
field.label: Saturday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: sunday
field.label: Sunday
field.description: Select YES if delivery available, otherwise NO.

field.name: extradays
field.label: Extra deliveries on
field.description:
Enter dates on separate lines when deliveries are available on days they normally would not be (e.g. a special Sunday delivery).
Note that blocked dates always have priority.
Use date format Y-M-d.
For instance:
2012-07-01
2012-06-30

field.name: blockeddays
field.label: No deliveries on
field.description:
Enter dates on separate lines when deliveries are NOT available.
Note that blocked dates always take priority.
Use date format Y-M-d.
For instance:
2012-12-25
2013-12-25
2014-12-25

field.name: shownodate
field.label: No delivery date
field.description: Select SHOW if you want to prompt customer to select the date when none has been selected.

field.name: selectdate
field.label: No delivery date prompt
field.description: Enter the text to be displayed in the delivery date select box if no date has been selected.

field.name: dateformat
field.label: Date format
field.description: Enter the format of the delivery dates to be displayed to customer in select list text (use PHP date format).

field.name: nodeliverydate
field.label: No delivery date error
field.description: Enter the error message to be displayed if customer has not selected a delivery date.

field.name: misseddeliverytime
field.default: Sorry, %s is no longer available as a delivery date.
field.label: Missed delivery time
field.description: Enter the error message to be displayed if customer takes a long time creating the order and misses the deadline. Include %s in message to show the unavailable date.

field.name: refreshshipping
field.label: Refresh shipping
field.description: Select YES to refresh shipping options as soon as customer selects a delivery date.

field.name: onloadinit
field.label: Onload mechanism
field.description: Assigns default value to date on page initialisation.
